Description: Up for sale is a 2013 Gibson SG Future Tribute w/upgraded 490R/490T pickups. Great rock/metal guitar with resonance and sustain for days thanks to a mahogany body and set-in neck. She is in perfect working order, and excellent shape overall. Neck is straight, fretboard is clean, and frets show no wear. I bought this guitar because I love how simple and straight-forward it is. The asymmetrical Gibson neck is super comfy, and is smooth and fast. Since this is a "Future" model, it came stock with Steinberger gear less tuners. While I admit I was a bit skeptical at first, I quickly warmed to them...changing a set of strings takes less than 5 minutes, and the guitar holds its tune much better than with stock tuners. Plus...they look GREAT and add to the metal feel. While the stock '57 Classic pickups were good, I felt they were mis-matched for the tone and the look of the guitar. So, I upgraded to a hotter set of 490R/490T humbuckers from Gibson. Great decision...these pickups have much more attack than the stock '57 Classics, and the chrome covers give them a more metal look and feel that I thought matched the guitar better. This guitar uses the Gibson Quick Connect system, so changing the pickups was a snap. I also added a 3-ply pick guard to complete the look...overall, I LOVE result. Pure rock! This a your chance to own a unique SG with plenty of bite for a great price. Thanks for looking...she comes with the hard case shown.
Title: 2013 Gibson SG Future Tribute w/upgraded 490R/498T Pickups Made in USA
